<style>
    .s_tp_hierarchical_category_style_12 {
      position: relative;
    }

    .s_tp_hierarchical_category_style_12 .owl-nav {
      display: flex !important;
      justify-content: space-between;
      position: absolute;
      top: 50%;
      left: 0;
      right: 0;
      transform: translateY(-50%);
      z-index: 2;
      pointer-events: none;
    }

    .s_tp_hierarchical_category_style_12 .owl-nav button {
      background: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.1);
      border: none;
      font-size: 2rem;
      color: #333;
      pointer-events: all;
      padding: 0.5rem 1rem;
      border-radius: 50%;
      transition: background 0.3s ease;
    }

    .s_tp_hierarchical_category_style_12 .owl-nav button:hover {
      background: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.2);
    }

    .s_tp_hierarchical_category_style_12 .owl-nav .owl-prev::before {
      content: "‹";
    }

    .s_tp_hierarchical_category_style_12 .owl-nav .owl-next::before {
      content: "›";
    }
